amendment.description: Amendment originally sought to limit U.S. aid to Russia to not more than $150 million. \ As amended by the Obey substitute amendment (A037), U.S. aid to Russia was limited to not more than $195 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 63 in the Congressional Record of June 21, 1995 to limit U.S. aid to Russia to no more than $150 million in Fiscal Year 1996.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roemer amendment (A036) as amended Agreed to by recorded vote: 401 - 2 (Roll no. 448).
